message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60 and you get 40.
Let's try a bit more balanced split, 55 for me and 45 for you.
Bob, the value decreases fast. I'll take my previous offer back.  I get 55, you get 45.
You're getting a bit more desperate, I see. I'll take a bit more, 57 for me and 43 for you.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Let's just split it down the middle and be done with it.
You're losing value fast, I'm not. I'll take 60, you get 40. Time to decide.
